description: Try our easy to follow Watermelon Quench recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Juice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Father's Day,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Watermelon,Peanut free
name: Watermelon Quench Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg cold seedless watermelon, rind removed, cut into chunks, plus extra wedges to serve
1 tbs mint, plus extra mint sprigs to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Blend watermelon chunks, lime juice and ice in a blender on high speed for 2 minutes or until smooth. Add chopped mint and pulse to combine. Fill glasses with extra ice and pour over juice. Add extra mint sprigs and watermelon wedges to serve.
